title: Renegade: The Lives and Tales of Mark E. Smith
description: Fine/Very Good plus. Hardcover. No marks or inscriptions. A lovely clean very tight copy with unmarked black cloth boards and no bumping to corners. Dust jacket not price clipped or marked or torn with faint crease right across upper edge. 246pp. Autobiography of front man and leader of music band The Fall who has been with the band for three decades. ISBN 0670916749
author: Mark E. Smith
